task.title: Integrating Monday with Outside Applications
task.shortdesc: Monday allows users to connect with other apps. Connecting with other apps can notify communication channels when changes have been made to a task. Monday allows you to connect with Gmail, iCalander, Slack, Drive, Dropbox, MailChimp, Jira and many others. Integrations are a great way to make sure everyone is on the same page and up to date with tasks and projects.

prereq.p: If you want to connect Monday to an app, you must have an active account for the app you want to integrate. You must also login to Monday.

taskbody.context: Integration makes for seemless communication for projects. Follow the steps below to integrate Monday with an outside application.

step.cmd: From the board page, click the integration button on the top of the screen. (The icon within the button is shaped like an electrical plug).
You can search for the app in the search bar or look for the app in the app list.

info.p: Click the app you wish to integrate. Select App

step.cmd: Select which option you wish to integrate.

info.p:
Monday will request you sign in or select a connected account. Connect Your Account
Account

step.cmd: Connect account to Monday and your integration will be active.
